mapper.insert: insert into errand_orders( order_no, user_id, errand_type, title, description, pickup_address, delivery_address, contact_name, contact_phone, pickup_code, expected_time_range, reward, tip, total_amount, images, deadline, order_status, remark, create_time, update_time ) values ( #{orderNo}, #{userId}, #{errandType}, #{title}, #{description}, #{pickupAddress}, #{deliveryAddress}, #{contactName}, #{contactPhone}, #{pickupCode}, #{expectedTimeRange}, #{reward}, #{tip}, #{totalAmount}, #{images}, #{deadline}, 1, #{remark}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update errand_orders set order_status = #{status}, update_time = now() , runner_id = #{runnerId}, accepted_at = now() , completed_at = now() where order_no = #{orderNo} and order_status = 1 and runner_id is null and order_status in (2,3) and runner_id is not null
mapper.select: select * from errand_orders where order_status = #{status} order by create_time desc
select * from errand_orders where runner_id = #{runnerId} order by create_time desc
